title: Four new Ministers sworn in
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Four new Ministers have been sworn in today (14).

Accordingly, Dinesh Gunawardena has been sworn in as the Minister of Public administration, Prof. G.L. Peiris as the Foreign Minister, Prasanna Ranatunga as the Minister of Urban Development and housing and Kanchana Wijesekara as the Minister of Power and Energy.
